Content: To determine when a colony or other end-trade-partner gets to bid on a
resource or determine which part of a ''fair'' split they receive, we
could utilize trade weight. Trade weight might be granted by
population, production and special buildings ensuring larger more
prosperous worlds gain more ressources. This trade weight would travel
upwards the trade-network-tree. (I suggest decay in this source but
this would punish tall trees for no reason.)
